genericTables.credential-query: SELECT fullobject::text FROM ${_dbSchema}.${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN ${_dbSchema}.objecttypes objtype ON objtype.id = obj.objecttypes_id WHERE json_extract_path_text(fullobject, 'userName') = ${username} AND json_extract_path_text(fullobject, 'accountStatus') = 'active' AND objtype.objecttype = ${_resource}
genericTables.find-by-id: SELECT fullobject::text FROM ${_dbSchema}.${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN ${_dbSchema}.objecttypes objtype ON objtype.id = obj.objecttypes_id WHERE obj.objectid = ${id} AND objtype.objecttype = ${_resource}
genericTables.get-by-field-value: SELECT fullobject::text FROM ${_dbSchema}.${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN ${_dbSchema}.objecttypes objtype ON objtype.id = obj.objecttypes_id WHERE json_extract_path_text(fullobject, ${field}) = ${value} AND objtype.objecttype = ${_resource}
genericTables.get-users-of-direct-role: select obj.fullobject::text from ${_dbSchema}.${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN ${_dbSchema}.objecttypes objtype ON objtype.id = obj.objecttypes_id  INNER JOIN ${_dbSchema}.${_propTable} prop ON obj.id = prop.${_mainTable}_id where objtype.objecttype = ${_resource} AND prop.propKey LIKE '/roles/%' AND prop.propValue = ${role}
genericTables.query-all-ids: SELECT obj.objectid FROM ${_dbSchema}.${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN ${_dbSchema}.objecttypes objtype ON obj.objecttypes_id = objtype.id WHERE objtype.objecttype = ${_resource} LIMIT ${int:_pageSize} OFFSET ${int:_pagedResultsOffset}
genericTables.query-all-ids-count: SELECT COUNT(obj.objectid) AS total FROM ${_dbSchema}.${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN ${_dbSchema}.objecttypes objtype ON obj.objecttypes_id = objtype.id WHERE objtype.objecttype = ${_resource}
genericTables.query-all: SELECT obj.fullobject::text FROM ${_dbSchema}.${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN ${_dbSchema}.objecttypes objtype ON obj.objecttypes_id = objtype.id WHERE objtype.objecttype = ${_resource} LIMIT ${int:_pageSize} OFFSET ${int:_pagedResultsOffset}
genericTables.query-all-count: SELECT COUNT(obj.fullobject) AS total FROM ${_dbSchema}.${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN ${_dbSchema}.objecttypes objtype ON obj.objecttypes_id = objtype.id WHERE objtype.objecttype = ${_resource}
genericTables.for-userName: SELECT fullobject::text FROM ${_dbSchema}.${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN ${_dbSchema}.objecttypes objtype ON objtype.id = obj.objecttypes_id WHERE  json_extract_path_text(fullobject, 'userName') = ${uid} AND objtype.objecttype = ${_resource}
genericTables.scan-tasks: SELECT fullobject::text FROM ${_dbSchema}.${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN ${_dbSchema}.objecttypes objtype ON objtype.id = obj.objecttypes_id WHERE (json_extract_path_text(fullobject, VARIADIC string_to_array(SUBSTR(${property},2),'/')) < ${condition.before} AND objtype.objecttype = ${_resource} ) AND ( json_extract_path_text(fullobject, VARIADIC string_to_array(SUBSTR(${taskState.completed},2),'/')) is NULL )
genericTables.query-cluster-failed-instances: SELECT fullobject::text FROM ${_dbSchema}.${_mainTable} obj WHERE json_extract_path_text(fullobject, 'timestamp') <= ${timestamp} AND json_extract_path_text(fullobject, 'state') IN ('1','2')
genericTables.query-cluster-instances: SELECT fullobject::text FROM ${_dbSchema}.${_mainTable} obj WHERE json_extract_path_text(fullobject, 'type') = 'state'
genericTables.query-cluster-events: SELECT fullobject::text FROM ${_dbSchema}.${_mainTable} obj WHERE json_extract_path_text(fullobject, 'type') = 'event' AND json_extract_path_text(fullobject, 'instanceId') = ${instanceId}
genericTables.get-managed-users: SELECT fullobject::text FROM ${_dbSchema}.${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN ${_dbSchema}.objecttypes objtype ON objtype.id = obj.objecttypes_id WHERE objtype.objecttype = ${_resource} ORDER BY CASE WHEN ${orderByDir} = 'asc' then json_extract_path_text(fullobject, ${orderBy}) ELSE '' END ASC, CASE WHEN ${orderByDir} = 'desc' THEN json_extract_path_text(fullobject, ${orderBy}) ELSE '' END DESC LIMIT ${int:_pageSize} OFFSET ${int:_pagedResultsOffset}
genericTables.get-managed-users-filtered: SELECT fullobject::text FROM ${_dbSchema}.${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN ${_dbSchema}.objecttypes objtype ON objtype.id = obj.objecttypes_id WHERE objtype.objecttype = ${_resource} AND json_extract_path_text(fullobject, 'userName') LIKE concat(${userName},'%') AND json_extract_path_text(fullobject, 'mail') LIKE concat(${mail},'%') AND json_extract_path_text(fullobject, 'givenName') LIKE concat(${givenName},'%') AND json_extract_path_text(fullobject, 'sn') LIKE concat(${sn},'%') AND json_extract_path_text(fullobject, 'accountStatus') LIKE concat(${accountStatus},'%') ORDER BY CASE WHEN ${orderByDir} = 'asc' then json_extract_path_text(fullobject, ${orderBy}) ELSE '' END ASC, CASE WHEN ${orderByDir} = 'desc' THEN json_extract_path_text(fullobject, ${orderBy}) ELSE '' END DESC LIMIT ${int:_pageSize} OFFSET ${int:_pagedResultsOffset}
genericTables.get-managed-users-count: SELECT '{"total":' || COUNT(*) || '}' AS fullobject FROM ${_dbSchema}.${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN ${_dbSchema}.objecttypes objtype ON objtype.id = obj.objecttypes_id WHERE objtype.objecttype = ${_resource}
genericTables.get-managed-users-filtered-count: SELECT '{"total":' || COUNT(*) || '}' AS fullobject FROM ${_dbSchema}.${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN ${_dbSchema}.objecttypes objtype ON objtype.id = obj.objecttypes_id WHERE objtype.objecttype = ${_resource} AND json_extract_path_text(fullobject, 'userName') LIKE concat(${userName},'%') AND json_extract_path_text(fullobject, 'mail') LIKE concat(${mail},'%') AND json_extract_path_text(fullobject, 'givenName') LIKE concat(${givenName},'%') AND json_extract_path_text(fullobject, 'sn') LIKE concat(${sn},'%') AND json_extract_path_text(fullobject, 'accountStatus') LIKE concat(${accountStatus},'%')

explicitTables.get-users-of-direct-role: select objectid from ${_dbSchema}.${_table} where roles regexp concat('^(.*,)?',${role},'(,.*)?$')
explicitTables.get-notifications-for-user: select * FROM ${_dbSchema}.${_table} WHERE receiverId = ${userId} order by createDate desc
explicitTables.credential-internaluser-query: SELECT objectid, pwd, roles FROM ${_dbSchema}.${_table} WHERE objectid = ${username}
explicitTables.links-for-firstId: SELECT * FROM ${_dbSchema}.${_table} WHERE linkType = ${linkType} AND firstid = ${firstId}
explicitTables.links-for-secondId: SELECT * FROM ${_dbSchema}.${_table} WHERE linkType = ${linkType} AND secondid = ${secondId}
explicitTables.scan-tasks: SELECT * FROM ${_dbSchema}.${_table} WHERE ${property} < ${condition.before} AND ${taskState.completed} is NULL
explicitTables.audit-by-recon-id-type: SELECT * FROM ${_dbSchema}.auditrecon WHERE reconId = ${reconId} AND entryType = ${entryType}
explicitTables.audit-by-recon-id-situation: SELECT * FROM ${_dbSchema}.auditrecon WHERE reconId = ${reconId} AND situation = ${situation}
explicitTables.get-recons: SELECT reconId, activitydate, mapping, message FROM ${_dbSchema}.auditrecon WHERE mapping LIKE ${includeMapping} AND mapping NOT LIKE ${excludeMapping} AND entryType = 'summary' ORDER BY activitydate DESC

explicitTables.purge-by-recon-ids-to-keep: DELETE FROM ${_dbSchema}.auditrecon WHERE mapping LIKE ${includeMapping} AND mapping NOT LIKE ${excludeMapping} AND reconId NOT IN (${list:reconIds})
explicitTables.purge-by-recon-expired: DELETE FROM ${_dbSchema}.auditrecon WHERE mapping LIKE ${includeMapping} AND mapping NOT LIKE ${excludeMapping} AND activitydate < ${timestamp}
